title: Who’s Hurting the Most from Inflation?
sub_head: Workers suffer and it’s not so lovely for former workers either.
body:
Friday’s column about the impact of inflation on wage-earners had a number of readers noting that inflation is also not exactly welcome news for those who used to earn wages. “Yes, America is getting another pay cut, but the elderly on fixed incomes are getting slaughtered,” wrote Bill Fotsch.
Douglas Miller added:
